page.title: 15Events in our School Year'85
page.content: In Spring time we had a decorated egg display and an Easter Bonnet competition. After our two week{Easter holiday, we started learning maypole and country dancing to dance to our parents outside on the grass. We took part in a{Music Festival}with 13 other First Schools. The theme was "The Sea". We acted and danced "The Little Seal Girl". In July we had{Sports day, when everybody had fun and lots of races. We have five weeks summer holiday. In the{Autumn}we have a {Harvest Festival.}We usually make a big Harvest Loaf like a sheaf of corn and a scarecrow and sing Harvest songs. I like Havest. Near{Christmas we have a Christmas bazaar, with {Father Christmas.}We put on plays for our Mums and Dads and then have a big {Christmas party. By Kirsty Drew aged 8.
